name: Vitale #8
description: Your 1.50 carat round brilliant cut natural diamond is a remarkable gemstone with specific attributes that contribute to its beauty and value. Its VVS1 clarity, very very small inclusions, is combined with an exceptional white E colour, resulting in a captivating sparkle accentuated by its precise cut. Impeccably graded and crafted, this diamond promises timeless beauty and investment potential.
